comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Yikes! No me today. I have to do a Brown Bag in Law. (A Brown Bag in Law? More like a Harris Tweed Bag, wouldn't you imagine? An Armani 80% Worsted Bag And what pray, would be in said bag? Not PBJ's, I'd wager) I'm good-to-go for tomorrow though. If y'all want to accompany me in a Boulder Creek dip, we could revisit this route manana.
